Uses of IRuler in
 

Classes in Default Package that implement IRuler
 class MyRuler
          This is the class that you must implement to enable your ruler within the CodeRuler environment.
 

Uses of IRuler in com.ibm.ruler
 

Classes in com.ibm.ruler that implement IRuler
 class Ruler
          This class is the superclass of the Ruler that you implement.
 

Methods in com.ibm.ruler that return IRuler
static IRuler[] World.getOtherRulers()
          Returns an array of all the other rulers that you are currently competing against in this match.
static IRuler World.getLandOwner(int x, int y)
          Returns the ruler that has claimed the land at the given position, or null if the position is out of bounds or no ruler has claimed the land.
 IRuler IObject.getRuler()
          Returns the ruler that commands this object.
